remarks: Lemma for ~ lshpkrex .  The value of tentative functional ` G ` is zero iff its argument belongs to hyperplane ` U ` .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jul-2014.)
statement:
lshpkrlem.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lshpkrlem.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lshpkrlem.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lshpkrlem.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lshpkrlem.h $e |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) $.
lshpkrlem.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lshpkrlem.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. H ) $.
lshpkrlem.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
lshpkrlem.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lshpkrlem.e $e |- ( ph -> ( U .(+) ( N ` { Z } ) ) = V ) $.
lshpkrlem.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lshpkrlem.k $e |- K = ( Base ` D ) $.
lshpkrlem.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lshpkrlem.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lshpkrlem.g $e |- G = ( x e. V |-> ( iota_ k e. K E. y e. U x = ( y .+ ( k .x. Z ) ) ) ) $.
lshpkrlem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( X e. U <-> ( G ` X ) = .0. ) ) $.
$d .+ k x y $.
$d .0. k $.
$d .x. k x y $.
$d K k x $.
$d U k x y $.
$d V x $.
$d X k x y $.
$d Z k x y $.
